answers.answer: My daughter came early because of preeclampsia. I'm scared. I've been doing everything right at least I thought to prevent this.
Hope everything is good. Keep us posted
When did you get diagnosed? My blood pressure has been high im on meds. Im trying to positive but a little concerned.
Hope everything's ok. Preeclampsia is no joke. Had it with my first son and now I'm 31+5 and showing no symptoms.
Hope you're okay don't stress try to stay positive.
I delivered my baby at 28 weeks due to severe preeclampsia as well. It is really hard to deal with :( prayers with you and your baby

I was diagnosed about 4 years ago when I had my daughter and this time when I got pregnant doc told me I was High Risk because of last time. They kept me overnight still here. My blood pressure has went down and seems to be stabile. Have me on 24hr urine test and keeping an eye on me. What made me call ambulance was I was driving and my head started hurting really bad and vision started to get really blurry. Scared me and I was right blood pressure was very high.
Thanks for your prayers and support ladies I will continue to keep you updated.

I'm in the same boat... had it with my first and in 26.2 with my son and I'm waiting to get it this time... I always carry my wrist bp cuff with me. I also am scared me freaking out about it makes it worse!!! Anyways good luck and I'll keep you in my prayers

question: Had to be rushed to Labor and Delivery.  Only 28 weeks. I pray its not time...
title: Preeclampsia is knocking :-(
